channel.title: Minimalism on Mishal Abdullah

item.title: The Minimalist Phone - Guide
item.description: In this guide, we will be learning on how to make your phone a less distractive, and also how to reduce the time that you spend on your phone. You only need to follow a few steps, and it can take less than twenty minutes to make your phone a “minimalist” one. I came up with the name “minimalist phone” based on the minimalism philosophy, “saying no to things we donâ€™t like,”.
